title: Sustainability (journal)
text:
Sustainability is an international, cross-disciplinary, scholarly, peer-reviewed and <a href="open%20access">open access</a> <a href="scientific%20journal">journal</a> of environmental, cultural, economic, and social sustainability of human beings. It provides an advanced forum for studies related to sustainability and sustainable development, and is published semi-monthly online by <a href="MDPI">MDPI</a>. The journal is listed in <a href="Directory%20of%20Open%20Access%20Journals">DOAJ</a>. In September 2021 the journal was among the initial 13 journals included in the <a href="Norwegian%20Scientific%20Index">official Norwegian list</a> of possibly <a href="predatory%20journal">predatory journals</a>, known as level X.
Indexing.
This journal is indexed in the following databases:
According to the 2019 "<a href="Journal%20Citation%20Reports">Journal Citation Reports</a>", the journal’s impact factor is 2.576 (2019) and the 5-Year Impact Factor is 2.798.
According to JCR category rank, Sustainability now ranks 120/265 (Q2) in 'Environmental Sciences' (SCIE) and 26/41 (Q3) in 'Green & Sustainable Science & Technology'.
